node.title: Ripples from the Alabaster Box
node.description: Just like a stone thrown in a pond creates far-reaching ripples, so do our choices. They impact not only our lives but others’ as well. As Christ interacted with Mary at Simon’s house, we must learn from Him to act in God’s way of love, grace, and mercy. We need to be sensitive to others’ forgiven lives and walk as a forgiven/restored Christian ourselves.
